description: Building Community Resilience and Strengthening Local Government Capacities for Recovery and Disaster Risk Management

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to prevent, reduce and mitigate the impact of conflict
subproject.description: Seeks to increase capacity of local government units to integrate disaster risk reduction and management (DRRM) in policies and programs, enhance competencies and skills on recovery and gender-responsive DRRM, and strengthen multisectoral partnerships
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Resilience to Disasters

title: Community resilience and disaster risk reduction
